summary: A British writer pursues a young actress to Hollywood and needs all the help he can get to win her love.
cast: Tony Peers|Steve Huison|David Tennant|Margo Stanley|Vinessa Shaw|Saskia Reeves|Malcolm Tierney|Margi Clarke|Monte Hellman|Jean-Pierre Kalfon|Julie Delpy|Kevin West|Lisa Edelstein|Michael Campbell|Joe Dallesandro|Cameron Bancroft|Matthew Faber|Brent Morris|Mista Taboo|Dijon Talton|Vincent Gallo|Joey Perillo|Amanda Plummer|Dominic Gould|Andre Royo|Sakke Järvenpää|Mato Valtonen|Jerzy Skolimowski|Veeti Kallio|Don Ranvaud|Debra Carroll|James Le Gros|Tootie|Christa Lang|Michael Franco|Nathalie Huot|Joseph Arsenault|Robert Davi|Kenneth Hughes|Andy Bradford|Anouk Aimée|Johnny Depp|Mika Kaurismäki|Matti Pellonpää|Valentin Siroon|Anna Wendt
title: Colgados en Los Angeles
